kolambaa wishwa widyalaye deshapalana widya adhyayana anshayejyeshta kathikacharya dhamma disanayakamewara manawa himikam komisame 16 wani sasiwaraya aarambha wuye loka balawathage mulikathwayen shri lankawata manawa himikam pilibanda padamak iganwimataya.manawa himikam komisame chanda ayithiya athi ratawal wetha wiwidha andame balapam karamin amerikawa siya yojanawa sammatha kara ganima sandaha siyalu upakrama kriyathmaka kala athara ee sandaha owunge deshapalana balaya, aarthika shakthiya bhawitha karanu daknata labuni.pasugiyada manawa himikam komisame amerikanu thanapathini ayilin donaho pawasa thibune me yojanawa sammatha kirimen owun apeksha karanne yuddhaya awasan kalaye aarakshaka hamuda yatathe siduwi athayi kiyana awabhawithaya wasan nokara heli karaganima bawayi.esema owun sammatha karana yojanawa pussak wimata ida nothaba shri lanka aanduwa lawa ema yojana kriyawata nanwiya haki aakaraya pilibandawa owunge dadi awadhanaya yomu wi athayi da ayilin donahoge prakashayen thahawuru wiya.amerikanu yojanawa sammatha wimath samangama shri lankawe thaththwaya kebandu we da?
